polished_script:
HOOK: You're invisible on Google while agents with half your experience steal your listings. [ON-SCREEN: "INVISIBLE ON GOOGLE"]

BRAND INTRO: "This is D.J. Paris with Keeping It Real Podcast, and this is your agent tip of the day."

SETUP: TV producer turned agent coach Kim Ritberg sees this pattern everywhere: experienced agents losing deals to newer agents who simply show up better online. You've got the credentials, the track record, the expertise. But when sellers Google you, they find a basic bio while your competition has something much more powerful. [ON-SCREEN: "CREDENTIALS ≠ CONNECTIONS"]
[15-SEC RE-HOOK]: And Kim says there's one video that changes everything — but 90% of agents never make it.

INSIGHT: It's your About Me video. Not another listing tour or market update. The video that answers one question: "What makes you different than the agent around the corner?" Kim says a resume lists credentials, but an About Me video shows personality, shows proof, shows why YOU are the call they should make. [ON-SCREEN: "BIO = FACTS, VIDEO = FEELING"] When a seller researches three agents and two have bios but one has a video — guess who gets the call? In 2026, you're either on video or you're invisible.

REFRAME: Here's what shifts everything: Before your listing appointment, they've already heard your voice and decided they like you. You walk in warm, not cold. You're not pitching yourself anymore — you're confirming what they already believe. [ON-SCREEN: "WARM APPOINTMENTS > COLD PITCHES"]

CTA: "Do you have an About Me video on your Google results — yes or no?"

CLOSE: "See you next time."

---

CAPTION: The one video that turns Google searches into warm listing appointments (most agents skip this)
HASHTAGS: #RealEstate #VideoMarketing #ListingAgent #RealEstateMarketing #AgentTips
SHAREABLE_MOMENT: "In 2026, you're either on video or you're invisible."
PERFORMANCE_NOTES: [1] Emphasize "invisible" and "half your experience" in hook with slight pause. [2] Speed up during brand intro, then slow down for mirror moment in setup. [3] Direct eye contact on final question — make it feel personal.

_metadata.rewrite_changelog: Replaced vague competitor threat hook with direct visibility problem. Tightened insight around the strongest line. Completely rebuilt CTA into three specific actions with tonight/tomorrow deadlines and exact steps: record, upload with SEO title, text three specific people.
_metadata.judge_note: Hook creates a problem that doesn't connect to the solution—start with 'You're invisible on Google and here's the one video that fixes it' instead of a vague competitor threat.
